page.title: 02LOCATION
page.content: The main village ,Denholm, lies in the valley of the Teviot with the smaller village of Minto to the north at the foot of Minto Hill.The land around Minto Hill is rough and is used for grazing.The rest of the land which is flat and good farmland used for growing cereal crops and pasture for grazing.There is also a small dairy farm.Most trees are found growing around Minto hill.Beside Minto is a golf course which is open to the public.On top of Minto Craggs we have Fatlips Castle which is a small keep.The farms provide most of our jobs outside our village.There is a sawmill just about to be built outside Denholm which will provide more jobs.
